name: Grave of Torleif
description:
Grave of Torleif

As the always loyal butler Stanley, you help your employer, the historian Dr. Greenwood, as good as you can. Most of the time, you are not only helping him, but doing all the work, he is appraised for.

Gameplay

In Grave of Torleif you explore the gravesite of an old Viking leader and solve puzzles in the manner of classic point and click adventures.

Jam note

This game was made for inkJam 2021. Don't expect too much content.

Source Code

If you are interested, full source code is available here.

Font

The font in-game is the font 'Octavius' from Ikkle Font Pack by JackOatley.
